entity.name: BlogPostModeration
entity.description: Tracks blog post moderation activities.

field.name: moderator
field.description: The person who has moderated blog post.

field.name: comment
field.description: Comment about blog post if available.

field.name: date_updated
field.description: Date when the review is updated.

entity.name: BlogPostModerationReply
entity.description:
Stores a list of moderation related conversations.
Requires: MemberManagementBundle

entity.name: BlogPostTag
entity.description: Stores a list of tag definitions.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the tag is added.

field.name: count_posts
field.description: Number of posts associated with this tag.

field.name: blog
field.description: Blog that this tag belongs to.

field.name: site
field.description: Site that this tag belongs to.

field.name: date_updated
field.description: Date when the entry is updated.

field.name: date_removed
field.description: Date when the entry is marked as removed.

entity.name: BlogPostTagLocalization
entity.description:
Stores localized values of blog post tags.
Requires: MultiLanguageSupportBundle

entity.name: TagsOfBlogPost
entity.description: Associates tags with posts.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the tag has been added to the post.

entity.name: Blog
entity.description: Stores all blog definitions.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the blog is created.

field.name: date_updated
field.description: Date when the blog is last updated.

field.name: count_posts
field.description: Number of total posts within blog.

field.name: date_removed
field.description: Date when the entry is marked as removed.

entity.name: BlogLocalization
entity.description: Stores localized values for each blog entryç

entity.name: BlogModerator
entity.description:
Associates members with moderation rights with blogs or blog post categories.
Requires: MemberManagemetBundle

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the member is assigned to blog as moderator.

field.name: category
field.description: If member is a moderator of only a specific category.

entity.name: BlogPostCategory
entity.description:
Stores definitions of blog post categories.
Requires: [SiteManagementBundlle]

field.name: blog
field.description: Blog that post category belongs to.

field.name: site
field.description: Site that blog post category belongs to.

field.name: date_updated
field.description: Date when the entry is last updated.

field.name: date_removed
field.description: Date when the entry is last removed.

entity.name: BlogPostCategoryLocalization
entity.description:
Stores localized values for each post category.
Requires: MultiLanguageSupportBundle

entity.name: BlogPost
entity.description: Holds definitions of blog posts.

field.name: blog
field.description: Blog that post is written for.

field.name: site
field.description: Site that blog post belongs to.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the blog post is added.

field.name: date_approved
field.description: Date when the blog post is approved

field.name: date_published
field.description: Date when the blog post will be published.

field.name: date_unpublished
field.description: Date when the blog post will be unpublished.

field.name: count_view
field.description: Number of times a blog post viewed.

field.name: count_like
field.description: Total number of likes that blog post gets.

field.name: count_dislike
field.description: Total number of dislikes that the blog post gets.

field.name: count_comment
field.description: Total number of comments associated with the blog post.

field.name: date_updated
field.description: Date when the entry is last updated.

field.name: date_removed
field.description: Date wheb tge entry is marked as removed.

entity.name: BlogPostLocalization
entity.description: Stores localized values for each blog post entry.

field.name: url_key
field.description: Localized url key of blog post.

field.name: meta_description
field.description: Localized meta description of blog post.

field.name: meta_keywords
field.description: Localized meta keywords of blog posts.

field.name: content
field.description: Blog post content - usually a json encoded string.

entity.name: BlogPostComment
entity.description:
Holds a list of comments made to each blog post.
Requires: MemberManagementBundle, [SiteManagementBundlle]

field.name: parent
field.description: If this is a comment-reply then the parent comment.

field.name: author
field.description: Author of the comment if a registered member.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the comment is added.

field.name: date_removed
field.description: Date when the comment is removed.

field.name: date_published
field.description: Date when the comment is published.

field.name: count_likes
field.description: Number of likes that this comment gets.

field.name: count_dislikes
field.description: Number of dislikes that this comment gets.

field.name: site
field.description: Site that blog post comment belongs to.

entity.name: BlogPostCommentAction
entity.description:
Keeps track of actions (likes, dislikes) for each blog post comment.
Requires: MemberManagementBundle

field.name: post
field.description: Blog post that action is made.

field.name: member
field.description: Only registered members can post actions.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the action has been added.

entity.name: BlogPostAction
entity.description:
Keeps track of actions (likes, dislikes) for each blog post. Tracks only member actions.
Requires: MemberManagementBundle

field.name: member
field.description: Member who has done the action.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the action is occured.

entity.name: CategoriesOfBlogPost
entity.description: Associates blog posts with categories.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when blog post added to category.

entity.name: FavoriteBlogPostsOfMember
entity.description:
Keeps track of each user's favorite blog posts.
Requires: MemberManagementBundle-

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the member favorited the blog post.

entity.name: FeaturedBlogPost
entity.description: Stores definitions of featured blog posts.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when post has been added to featured list.

field.name: date_published
field.description: Date when post is published as featured.

field.name: date_unpublished
field.description: Date when the post will be removed from features aread.

field.name: date_updated
field.description: Date when the entry is last updated.

field.name: date_removed
field.description: Date when the entry is marked as removed.

entity.name: RelatedBlogPost
entity.description: Defines all related posts that are associated with the original post.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the post is related.

entity.name: BlogPostRevision
entity.description: Holds revisions of blog post.

field.name: date_added
field.description: Date when the entry is added.

field.name: date_updated
field.description: Date when the entry is last updated.

field.name: date_removed
field.description: Date when the entry is last removed.

comment.caption: BlogBundle Pricing
comment.description:
blog: 125 TL blog_localization: 180 TL blog_moderator: 155 TL blog_post: 620 TL blog_post_localization: 190 TL blog_post_action: 130 TL blog_post_category: 175 TL blog_post_category_localization: 150 TL blog_post_comment: 315 TL blog_post_comment_action: 215 TL blog_post_field: 130 TL blog_post_field_localization: 150 TL blog_post_field_content: 220 TL blog_post_moderation: 210 TL blog_post_moderation_reply: 230 TL blog_post_tag: 195 TL blog_post_tag_localization: 130 TL categories_of_blog_post: 150 TL favorite_blog_post_of_member: 110 TL featured_blog_post: 145 TL featured_blog_post_localization: 110 TL files_of_blog_post: 130 TL related_blog_posts: 110 TL tags_of_blog_post: 110 TL
toplam: 3.155 TL
